title: Qualify a New Supplier
description: A procurement manager needs to add a new potential supplier to the system for a specific commodity.

tasks.description: Collect required documentation from the potential supplier (e.g., quality certifications, financial statements).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent receives and logs the necessary documents.

tasks.description: Enter the new supplier's details into the supplier relationship management (SRM) system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a new supplier profile with all contact and business information.

tasks.description: Initiate the supplier qualification workflow for internal review and approval.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent submits the new supplier profile for approval by the quality and finance teams.
